summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for the Butterfly Trust for the month of December 2016. It includes information on account balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting the financial activity within the specified period.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The document details the financial activity of the Butterfly Trust account for December 2016.
The beginning balance of the account on December 1, 2016, was $2.98.
The ending balance as of December 31, 2016, was $2.99.
There were deposits and other credits totaling $50.01 during the month.
Service charges and fees were noted, including a total of $50.00 for NSF return items for the calendar year.
